scripts.debug: tsc && egret build test/es6-api -e && egret-cli resource build test/es6-api && egret run test/es6-api
scripts.test: egret build test/es6-api -e && egret-cli resource build test/es6-api && egret run test/es6-api
scripts.test-classic: egret build test/classic-api -e && egret-cli resource build test/classic-api && egret run test/classic-api
